title: Ep. - 427 - UNSOLVED MURDER OF CONNIE HINER WITH JONATHAN MARK
description:
Kate interviews Brittany whose mother Connie Hiner, a 48-year old real estate executive, was found dead in her home on Woodstock Lane in Herndon, Virginia on January 3, 1996. Medium Jonathan speaks with Kate and Brittany to fill in some missing pieces with the hope of helping solve this unsolved case.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey
